question:
Which among the following appointments is / are made by President of India as per the provisions of Constitution of Jammu & Kashmir?
  1. Governor of Jammu & Kashmir
  2. Judge of the High Court of Jammu & Kashmir
  3. Chief Justice of the High Court of Jammu & Kashmir
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All the given posts are appointed by President of India as per powers conferred in theÂ Constitution of Jammu & Kashmir. You may refer to article 27 and 95 of the J&K constitution here.
